short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Convfy tells you how engaging your tweets are & gives suggestions to add missing elements to increase engagement.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
With convfy, you can express yourself more creatively, more efficiently and reach a larger audience. 

We analyzed 16 million tweets to come up with a simple tool that tells you what elements are missing in your conversations.
With our instant suggestions you can be sure that you have expressed all you can.

·      Get real time engagement scores.
·      Instant Suggestions to find missing elements with a click of a button.

--------------
Version 1.4

This version includes tick marks for elements that have already been added. 
Includes number of followers as a factor

--------------

If you like our tool, please leave us a rating. It helps us a lot :)

Do you tweet ? So do we. Reach us @convfy
